SuperTK 0.1.0
  • Reference

    Create pseudo documentation.

    GetHelper.Rd

    Help developpers to create a documentation directly in a function. Usefull when the function is in a source script.

    Arguments

    x.fun

    <function or call>: a function (or a call of) with the Helper header.

    Value

    A character string ready to use in 'cat' function.

    Details

    GetHelper

    Examples

    my_fun = function(x,y,z, help.bln=F){
# Helper
#Na. my_fun
#De. A function that do the mean
#Us. my_fun(x,y,z)
#Ar. x (numeric, integer)
#Ar. y (numeric, integer)
#Ar. z (numeric, integer)
#Va. the mean of x, y and z
#Ex. my_fun(1,3,5)
if(help.bln){return(cat(GetHelper(sys.call())))}
# Run
return(mean(c(x,y,z)))
}
my_fun(help.bln=TRUE)
#> Error in eval(parse(text = fun.name)): object 'my_fun' not found
